admission.answer: You can apply for admission through the university portal. Applications open in June every year.

attendance.answer: Students must maintain at least 75% attendance to be eligible for exams.

exams.answer: Examinations are conducted at the end of each semester as per the academic calendar.

fees.answer: Fees can be paid online using net banking, debit card, or credit card.

contact.answer: You can contact student support at support@university.edu or call 123-456-7890.
